message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. You get 10% and I get 90%. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can have 70% and I'll take 30%.
Okay, I'm willing to give you a little more.  Let's split it 80/20.  I think this is a good compromise.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. You can have 60% and I'll take 40%.
